# addOutput(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an output to the capture session.

## Declaration

```swift
func addOutput(_ output: AVCaptureOutput)
```

## Parameters

- **output**: An output to add to the session.

## Discussion

You can only add an output to a session using this method if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/canAddOutput(_:)] returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

You can invoke this method while the session is running.

## Configuring outputs

- **outputs**: The output destinations to which a captures session sends its data.
- **canAddOutput(_:)**: Determines whether you can add an output to a session.
- **removeOutput(_:)**: Removes an output from a capture session.
